bookmarks.title: Chakra UI
bookmarks.description: Chakra UI is a frontend framework for react. 10/10 IMO best frontend framework.

bookmarks.title: Second Bookmark
bookmarks.description: nextJSCrud is a simple todo app built using NodeJS, NextJS, Expres and MongoDB stack. Its a very simple project that I was using to re-learn/ touch up on my skills with full-stack development
